description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Welcome to Rate My Avatar V1.1! - the only app that lets you share your avatar with users from around the world! Put your style in the spotlight and see what others truly think of you - do you have what it takes to enter the prestigious Hall of Fame, or should your next accessory be a paper bag?! (Xbox Live Gold account required for online functionality)
